node.name: Summer Hatathon 2024
node.description:
The first ever Hatathon is now on through August 31! 

ETH rewards are available to the first 10 orgs who create a new Hats tree, and to the best overall new tree

Office hours: https://calendly.com/hatsprotocol/hatathon-office-hours

node.name: Autonomous Admin
node.description: This hat future-proofs the rest of the tree, as it can be granted the ability to automate hat revocation, claiming, and minting for any hats below it based on specified accountability criteria

node.name: DAO Council
node.description: This DAO Council hat is worn by members of the DAO Council, granting them the permissions of the Council shown below for the period of their term.
